name: Drizzile
description: A clever combatant, this Pokémon battles using water balloons created with moisture secreted from its palms.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its water-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
abilities.description: Ups WATER moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.effect: This Pokémon inflicts triple damage with critical hits, rather than the usual double damage.
abilities.description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.
